attributes.action: Stop MP's profiteering on the 2nd home scheme.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the taxpayer has to fund the MP's 2nd home then the Tax Payer should reap the resale profit. i.e. the resale price should be returned to the treasury or the house transferred to another MP.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
